Copycat KFC Coleslaw


Ingredients
1 (14 ounce) package coleslaw mix
¼ cup finely chopped yellow onion
½ cup mayonnaise
¼ cup sugar
2 tablespoons milk
2 tablespoons buttermilk
2 tablespoons white wine vinegar
½ teaspoon salt
⅛ teaspoon black pepper

Cooking Instructions

Stir together coleslaw mix and onion in a large bowl. Whisk
together mayonnaise, sugar, milk, buttermilk, vinegar, salt,
and pepper in a second bowl until smooth. Pour dressing over
slaw; stir well and chill at least 2 hours or up to
overnight.
